trans-unit.source: Plays a media file.
trans-unit.target: 播放媒體檔案。

trans-unit.source: If the media is a video file, the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing" /> draws it to the specified rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 如果媒體為視訊檔，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing" /> 會將它繪製到指定的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Although you can declare an instance of this class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot load and play its media without using code, because of the dependency on the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer> class and in particular the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Play%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 雖然您可以宣告此類別中的執行個體[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，您無法載入，並不使用程式碼中，由於相依性上, 播放媒體<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer>類別，尤其是<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Open%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaPlayer.Play%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To play media in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] only, use a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>.
trans-unit.target: 若要在中播放媒體[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]只能使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>。

trans-unit.source: Despite its name, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> can be used to play audio.
trans-unit.target: 儘管其名稱<xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>可用來播放音訊。

trans-unit.source: **Performance Note:** A <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> provides fewer features then an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>: <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> does not support layout, input, or focus.
trans-unit.target: **效能提示：** A<xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>提供較少的功能則<xref:System.Windows.Controls.MediaElement>:<xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>版面配置、 輸入或焦點不支援。

trans-unit.source: However, because it does not support these features, <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> provides performance benefits making them ideal for describing backgrounds, clip art, and for low-level drawing with <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> objects.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為它不支援這些功能，<xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>提供效能優勢，使其適合用來描述背景、 美工圖案，並針對低層級與繪圖<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>物件。

trans-unit.source: See [Drawing Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/drawing-objects-overview.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[繪圖物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/drawing-objects-overview.md)如需詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>是一種<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件，並因此可凍結來改善效能。

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關資訊<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，例如凍結和複製，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the VideoDrawing class.
trans-unit.target: 可初始化 VideoDrawing 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the media player associated with the drawing.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與繪圖相關聯的媒體播放器。

trans-unit.source: The media player associated with the drawing.
trans-unit.target: 與繪圖相關聯的媒體播放器。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing.Player" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing.Player" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rectangular area in which the video is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在其內繪製視訊的矩形區域。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle in which the video is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 在其內繪製視訊的矩形。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing.Rect" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing.Rect" /> 相依性屬性。
